config_description: Cannot found this configuration description for this configuration.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration _journalAgeThreshold is used in the code to set the age threshold for the journal. It is passed as a parameter to the PersistentJournal constructor along with other parameters.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration depends on the usage of the journal. It will be triggered whenever a new journal is created or when the age threshold condition is met.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the _journalAgeThreshold configuration option on the system is that it determines how long journal entries are kept before they are considered old and potentially removed. Setting a lower age threshold may result in more frequent journal cleanups and potentially more disk space usage.
